graph

Class GraphLog

  • java.lang.Object
    • graph.GraphLog

  • public class GraphLog
extends java.lang.Object
    This Log class is responsible for formatting the graph analysis data and streaming it to the output file. Output file formatting is all controlled here and can be changed with this class if needed.
    Author:
    Wesley Chan

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private boolean[][] adjMatrix 
      private static int counter 
      private java.lang.String[] headers 
      private WriteFile outputFile 
      private java.lang.String paths 
      private int[][] rawHeaders

      Constructor for the GraphLog class that accepts 3 arguments.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private void createHeaders()
      Creates the headers for the possible paths in the graph
      private void createRawHeaders()
      Contains all possible node combinations in the graph, regardless of whether or not there are paths connecting the node.
      private java.lang.String horizontalRule() 
      private java.lang.String linearSearch(java.lang.String startVertex, java.lang.String endVertex)
      Linear search through the entire path list and selects the paths with the corresponding start and end vertices.
      private java.lang.String matrixToString()
      Converts the 2D boolean adjacency matrix to a String for streaming.
      void write()
      Formats all the analyzed data and streams the data to the output file.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GraphLog

        GraphLog(boolean[][] adjMatrix,
         java.lang.String paths,
         WriteFile outputFile)
        Constructor for the GraphLog class that accepts 3 arguments.
        Parameters:
        adjMatrix - is a 2D boolean array of the adjacency matrix that was used to create a Directed Graph data structure
        paths - is a String all possible paths from the analyzed graph
        outputFile - is the output file

    • Method Detail

      • write

        public void write()
           throws java.io.IOException
        Formats all the analyzed data and streams the data to the output file. Adds line breaks and horizontal rules for readability.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if output file cannot be found.

      • linearSearch

        private java.lang.String linearSearch(java.lang.String startVertex,
                                      java.lang.String endVertex)
        Linear search through the entire path list and selects the paths with the corresponding start and end vertices. This search has a time complexity of O(n).
        Parameters:
        startVertex - Start of path
        endVertex - End of path
        Returns:
        Path with the matching start and end vertex, No Paths Found otherwise.

      • horizontalRule

        private java.lang.String horizontalRule()

      • matrixToString

        private java.lang.String matrixToString()
        Converts the 2D boolean adjacency matrix to a String for streaming.
        Returns:
        String of the adjacency matrix.

      • createHeaders

        private void createHeaders()
        Creates the headers for the possible paths in the graph

      • createRawHeaders

        private void createRawHeaders()
        Contains all possible node combinations in the graph, regardless of whether or not there are paths connecting the node.
